column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I came back to provide an update of photos. My rating remains the same
column2: I will always recommend Bosscat for brunch in Houston. The photos I added for are from the two recent times that I went. The short rib chilaquiles were just OK
column3: nothing really wow about them. They just weren't flavorful to me. But the star of the show is the vegetable omelette. I know it sounds super simple but it was so good. From the goat cheese
column5: to the micro greens it was excellent. I always appreciate when restaurants do simple items so well. Again
column6: if you're visiting Houston or just looking for a new brunch spot make sure to give Bosscat a try!
